title: Deep dwarf (monster)
data:
{{version017}} ''This article is about the deep dwarf monster. For the player species, see [[deep dwarf]].''
''For a list of all monstrous deep dwarves, see [[list of deep dwarves]].'' {{monster info|deep dwarf}} ==Useful Info== Untrained '''deep dwarves''' are the least threatening of the [[list of deep dwarves|deep dwarf]] people. While they lack any exotic abilities, their deep dwarf [[deep dwarf#Damage Reduction|damage reduction]] and better-than-average dwarven equipment does render them slightly more dangerous than most humanoid monsters. They only appear in rare [[vault]]s. If you see one, it's likely a [[shapeshifter (monster)|shapeshifter]]. [[Category:Dwarf]]
